::Autofire::

At the same moment that Razorclaw was wondering where Autofire was,
two missiles smashed into Autofire's side, sending him flipping
sideways through the air and barely managing to stay airborne. He
swears to himself. This was quite enough. Megatron didn't say to
destroy, he said to attack.

"Decepticons, we've done enough damage," he says aloud, since
communication was still being jammed by the Element. Speakers on the
front of his vehicle mode project his voice all over the battlefield,
"Lets get out of here."

With that he looks around and turns toward the Decepticon base, flying
off toward it but looking back to see if there were any Decepticons
that would need help getting back.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Razorclaw::
> The explosions envelope the area around Razorclaw. He leaps 
> backwards, dodging machine gun fire, and fires twice at Khonkolor 
> and Haluicigen. He notices his charred armour, and wonders how 
> much more of this he can take, how soon to pull out. <Where's 
> Autofire?> he thinks, his eyes flicking around from the enemy he 
> was fighting to the rest of the battle field.
